DebitMemoLine.name: DebitMemoLine
DebitMemoLine.description: Represents the additional charge amount that the buyer must pay for the product, service, or debit memo line tax that’s related to the debit memo.

BillingAddressId.description: The billing address record that’s related to the debit memo line.

ChargeAmount.description: The amount of the debit memo line item.

CorpCurrencyCnvChargeAmt.description: The charge amount of the debit memo line in corporate currency.

CorporateCurrencyCvsnDate.description: The date on which the debit memo line amounts are converted into corporate currency.

CorporateCurrencyCvsnRate.description: The exchange rate that’s used to convert debit memo line amounts into corporate currency.

CorporateCurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency ISO code of the corporate currency.

DebitMemoId.description: The parent debit memo record that’s related to the debit memo line record.

Description.description: The description of the debit memo line.

EndDate.description: The end date of the debit memo line that determines which billing cycle it must be associated with.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed a debit memo address record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a debit memo address record. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user only accessed the debit memo address record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the debit memo address record itself.

LegalEntityAccountingPeriodId.description: The legal entity accounting period record that’s related to the debit memo line.

LegalEntityId.description: The legal entity record that’s related to the debit memo line.

Name.description: An auto-generated name assigned to the debit memo line.

Product2Id.description: The ID of the product or service being debited in the debit memo line.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The record ID associated with the debit memo line record. The record ID is an asset, invoice line, contract, or refund record.

ShippingAddressId.description: The shipping address record that’s related to the debit memo line.

StartDate.description: The start date of the debit memo line that determines which billing cycle it must be associated with.

TaxTreatmentId.description: The ID of the tax treatment record that’s related to the debit memo line.

DebitMemoLine.accessRules: Revenue Cloud Billing license and one of these permission sets to access this object
